attributes.action: Make Captain Tom Moore a Sir
attributes.additional_details: This Gentleman has served his country and at a time when he should be taken care off he has selflessly tried to raise money for NHS charities
attributes.background:
Captain Tom Moore will be 100 at the end of April. He has over £7 million pound for NHS charities.
This gentleman is an inspiration to us all and should be commended for his efforts

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
